testcase.name: To create the product entry in JSON format
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://dummyjson.com' ......................................... passed Given path '/products/add' ................................................ passed And request {"id": 131,"title": "Bad Title","description": "Bad des","price": 10,"discountPercentage": 10.00,"rating": 10.00,"stock": 10,"stocks": 20,"brand": "Bad brand","category": "Bad category","thumbnail": "https://i.dummyjson.com/data/products/1/thumbnail.jpg","images": ["https://i.dummyjson.com/data/products/1/1.jpg","https://i.dummyjson.com/data/products/1/2.jpg","https://i.dummyjson.com/data/products/1/3.jpg","https://i.dummyjson.com/data/products/1/4.jpg","https://i.dummyjson.com/data/products/1/thumbnail.jpg"]} . passed And headers {Accept:'application/json' , Content-Type:'application/json'} . passed When method post .......................................................... passed And status 200 ............................................................ passed Then print response ....................................................... passed And match response.title == "Bad Title" ................................... passed
